title: How To Overcome Procrastination And Boost Productivity
summary: There are many potential causes of procrastination, but they all come down to two things: a bad feeling and a bad promise. The formula for procrastinating is simple: the less you want to do something, the more you promise yourself to do it. When the bad feeling of doing something outweighs the bad promise you’re making to yourself, you feel so uncomfortable you just can’t continue working. The secret to overcoming procrastina is to identify and address the causes of your procrastinations, and implement the solution that works best.
